snippet: The inspectors general of two government agencies are embroiled in a highly unusual dispute that centers on a senior employee who has worked for the Department of Veterans Affairs and the Treasury Department.
abstract: Treasury inspector general Eric Thorson issues report disputing allegations made in Veteran Affairs inspector general report alleging improper conduct by former VA official Iris Cooper; charges that another VA official, Jan Frye, sought to retaliate against Cooper, and calls into question integrity of VA inspector general's office.
lead_paragraph: The inspectors general of two government agencies are embroiled in a highly unusual dispute that centers on a senior employee who has worked for the Department of Veterans Affairs and the Treasury Department.

headline.main: Treasury Department Faults Veterans Affairs in Feud Over Employee
headline.print_headline: Treasury Faults V.A. in Feud Over Employee
